titlealts.searchtitle: Attribute: POSITION BUDGETED FULL TIME EQUIVALENT - Description

body.p: The authorised Contracted Full Time Equivalent (FTE) budgeted for a POSITION .
This may also be known as the 'Authorised' or 'Planned' FTE or 'Establishment'.
It describes the authorised amount of time which may be contracted for a POSITION . This may be greater than, less than or equal to 1.
If related to funding, the FTE may be 'Paid' rather than 'Contracted'. Each grade, and the amount of FTE within each grade, is added together to calculate the Budgeted FTE for the block.
